member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.receive
member.summary: Receives and processes one DTrack data packet.
member.returns: true if a DTrack data packet is received successfully, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getFrameCounter const
member.summary: Returns a frame counter (counting with synchronization frequency).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getTimeStamp const
member.summary: Returns the time at the measurement of the current frame, i.e. the time when the infrared flash of the cameras is fired. The timestamp uses the internal clock of the controller, giving back the seconds (with an accuracy of 1μs) since 00:00 UTC (midnight). This implies that the timestamp value is reset to zero when passing midnight (UTC).
member.returns: Time at the measurement of the current frame.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.init(char,int)
member.summary: Initializes communication with DTrack.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.start
member.summary: Starts communication with DTrack.
member.returns: true if communication started successfully, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.stop
member.summary: Stops communication with DTrack.
member.returns: true if communication stopped successfully, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getNumBody const
member.summary: Returns the number of DTrack bodies.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getBodyID(int)
member.summary: Returns DTrack body ID.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getBodyQuality(int)
member.summary: Returns the quality value of DTrack body, the value within the interval [0;1], or -1, if not tracked.
member.returns: Quality, the value within the interval [0;1], or -1, if not tracked.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getBodyLocation(int)
member.summary: Returns the specified DTrack body location.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getBodyRotation(int)
member.summary: Returns the specified DTrack body rotation matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getNumFlyStick const
member.summary: Returns the number of defined (calibrated) Flystick bodies.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getFlyStickID(int)
member.summary: Returns the specified Flystick ID.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getFlyStickQuality(int)
member.summary: Returns the tracking quality value within the range [0; 1], or -1 if the Flystick is not tracked.
member.returns: Tracking quality value within the range [0; 1], or -1 if the Flystick is not tracked.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getFlyStickNumButton(int)
member.summary: Returns the number of available buttons and controllers for the indicated Flystick. Information about buttons and controllers is valid as long as the wireless transmission is active.
member.returns: Number of available buttons and controllers.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getFlyStickButton(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the status of the given Flystick button.
member.returns: Button state: 1 - if the button is pressed, 0 — if not pressed.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getFlyStickNumJoyStick(int)
member.summary: Returns the number of joystick values of a specified Flystick.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getFlyStickJoyStick(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the joystick value.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getFlyStickLocation(int)
member.summary: Returns the Flystick body location (in mm).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getFlyStickRotation(int)
member.summary: Returns the FlyStick rotation matrix (column-wise).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getNumMeaTool const
member.summary: Returns the number of defined (calibrated) Measurement tools.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getMeaToolID(int)
member.summary: Returns the Measurement Tool ID (starting from 0).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getMeaToolQuality(int)
member.summary: Returns the value specifying the measurement quality.
member.returns: 1.0 if the target of the Measurement Tool is visible at the moment, or −1.0 if it is invisible.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getMeaToolNumButton(int)
member.summary: Returns the number of available buttons for the specified Measurement Tool.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getMeaToolButton(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the button state for the specified Measurement Tool.
member.param: Index of the Measurement Tool button.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getMeaToolLocation(int)
member.summary: Returns the Measurement Tool location.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getMeaToolRotation(int)
member.summary: Returns the Measurement Tool rotation matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getMeaToolTipRadius(int)
member.summary: Returns the radius of the Measurement Tool tip sphere.
member.returns: Radius of the Measurement Tool tip sphere.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getMeaToolCovariance(int)
member.summary: Returns the covariance of the tool tip location, in mm2.
member.returns: Covariance matrix of the position of the tool tip.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getNumMeaRef const
member.summary: Returns the number of defined reference bodies of the Measurement Tool.
member.returns: Number of defined reference bodies of the Measurement Tool.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getMeaRefID(int)
member.summary: Returns the ID of the reference body of the Measurement Tool.
member.param: Index of the reference body of the Measurement Tool.
member.returns: ID of the Measurement reference (starting with 0).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getQuality(int)
member.summary: Returns the value specifying the measurement quality.
member.param: Index of the reference body of the Measurement Tool.
member.returns: 1.0 if the target of the Measurement Tool is visible at the moment, or −1.0 if it is invisible.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getMeaRefLocation(int)
member.summary: Returns the position of the reference body of the Measurement Tool.
member.param: Index of the reference body of the Measurement Tool.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getMeaRefRotation(int)
member.summary: Returns the rotation matrix of the reference body of the Measurement Tool.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getNumMarker const
member.summary: Returns the number of tracked additional markers.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getMarkID(int)
member.summary: Returns the marker ID number.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getMarkQuality(int)
member.summary: Returns the value specifying the measurement quality.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getMarkLocation(int)
member.summary: Returns the marker location.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getNumHand const
member.summary: Returns the number of tracked hand bodies.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getHandID(int)
member.summary: Returns the hand ID number.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getHandQuality(int)
member.summary: Returns the value specifying the measurement quality.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getHandLeft(int)
member.summary: Returns the value to distinguish between the left and right hand.
member.returns: The value to distinguish between the left (0) and right (1) hand.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getHandNumFinger(int)
member.summary: Returns the number of fingers for the specified hand. The maximum number of fingers is 5. Based on this number, each finger can be addressed using its index starting from the thumb — 0, index finger — 1, etc.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getHandLocation(int)
member.summary: Returns location (in mm) of the specified hand.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getHandRotation(int)
member.summary: Returns the rotation matrix of the specified hand.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getHandFingerLocation(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the location (in mm) for the specified hand finger.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getHandFingerRotation(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the rotation matrix (column-wise) for the specified hand finger.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getHandFingerTipRadius(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the radius of the finger tip.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getHandFingerLengthPhalanx(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the length of a all phalanxes or the specified finger.
member.returns: Length of phalanxes in the order: outermost, middle, innermost.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getHandFingerAnglePhalanx(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the angles between the phalanxes of a finger.
member.returns: Angles between phalanxes of a finger.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getNumHuman const
member.summary: Returns the number of human models.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getHumanID(int)
member.summary: Returns the ID of the human model (starting with 0).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getHumanNumJoints(int)
member.summary: Returns the number of joints of the human model.
member.returns: Number of joints of the human model.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getHumanJointID(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the ID of the joint (starting with 0).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getHumanJointQuality(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the tracking quality value within the range [0; 1], or -1 if the joint is not tracked.
member.returns: Tracking quality value within the range [0; 1], or -1 if the joint is not tracked.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getHumanJointLocation(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the location of the joint (in mm).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getHumanJointAngle(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the angle of the selected joint in relation to the joint coordinate system.
member.returns: Angle in relation to the joint coordinate system.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getHumanJointRotation(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the rotation matrix of the joint (column-wise) in relation to room coordinate system.
member.returns: Rotation matrix of the joint (column-wise) in relation to room coordinate system.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getNumInertial const
member.summary: Returns the number of all tracked standard 6DOF bodies (i.e. all 6DOF bodies except Flysticks, Measurement Tools, etc.) and all hybrid bodies.
member.returns: Number of all tracked standard 6DOF bodies and all hybrid bodies.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getInertialID(int)
member.summary: Returns the ID number of the standard 6DOF body.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getInertialState(int)
member.summary: Returns the data tracking status.
member.returns: Tracking status of the sensor:0 — no tracking.1 — inertial tracking.2 — optical tracking.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getInertialError(int)
member.summary: Returns the current drift error estimation, in degrees, estimate rising by 10 degree per minute when tracking inertially.
member.returns: For the inertial state 1: current drift error estimation, in degrees [0;360].For the inertial states 0 and 2: 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getInertialLocation(int)
member.summary: Returns the position (in mm) of the Body.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getInertialRotation(int)
member.summary: Returns the rotation matrix of the Body's orientation.
member.returns: Rotation matrix (column-wise) of the Body's orientation.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.ARTTracker.getLastDataError const
member.summary: Returns the data on the last received error.
member.returns: Last received error, one of the ERROR_ values.
